title: Grant admin privileges to current user - Frontend verification

requirements.summary: Verify that payment configuration (Stripe settings) is visible in the account dashboard for users with admin privileges
acceptanceCriteria: Admin users can see the Stripe settings navigation card in the account dashboard
The Stripe settings card links correctly to the payment settings page
Non-admin users do not see admin-only configuration options

file_operations.description: Add admin permission check using the isCallerAdmin backend method and conditionally render a Stripe Settings navigation card for admin users. The card should link to the existing /admin/stripe-settings route. Include proper loading states while checking admin status. Verify the authorization component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a useIsCallerAdmin query hook that calls the backend's isCallerAdmin method. This hook should be enabled only when the actor is available and user is authenticated. Follow the existing query hook patterns in the file for consistency.
